title: Item Combos
body: Does anyone know any good AP item combos?  This is the only combo I know, {{item:3151}} +{{item:3116}}

replies.body: Well, if you're going for extra on hit damage with mages that auto attack a lot (TF, Lux, Le Blanc, Fizz), try {{item:3151}} +{{item:3100}}+{{item:3115}}+{{item:3124}} .
